pg13 1.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Depivot a Table

Source: R/depivot.R
depivot_table.Rd

Depivot a Table

depivot_table(
  conn,
  conn_fun,
  schema,
  table,
  names_to_columns,
  names_to,
  values_to_column,
  verbose = TRUE,
  render_sql = TRUE,
  render_only = FALSE
)

Examples

library(tidyverse)
conn <- pg13::local_connect()

#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
pg13::write_table(conn = conn,
                  schema = "public",
                  table_name = "test_table",
                  drop_existing = TRUE,
                  data =
                          tribble(~Person,~Attribute, ~Attribute_Value,
                                  "Meera", "Height", "Tall",
                                  "Syed", "Height", "Tall",
                                  "Syed", "Character", "Funny",
                                  "Meera", "Character", NA_character_))

#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Dropping public.test_table...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public.test_table;
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Sending...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Sending...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Dropping public.test_table...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Data 'data' has more than 0 rows
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Table name 'test_table' is not a reserved word
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Field name 'person' is not a reserved word
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Field name 'attribute' is not a reserved word
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Field name 'attribute_value' is not a reserved word
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Writing public.test_table...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Writing public.test_table...complete

pivot_table(conn = conn,
            schema = "public",
            table = "test_table",
            id_column = "person",
            names_from_column = "attribute",
            values_from_column = "attribute_value")

#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: SELECT DISTINCT attribute FROM public.test_table
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Returned data has more than 0 rows
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: SELECT udt_name as data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'test_table' AND column_name = 'attribute_value'
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Returned data has more than 0 rows
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: SELECT * FROM crosstab( 'select person, attribute, attribute_value from public.test_table ORDER BY 1,2') AS final_result(person VARCHAR, Character varchar,Height varchar)
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Returned data has more than 0 rows
#>   person character height
#> 1  Meera      <NA>   Tall
#> 2   Syed     Funny   Tall

depivot_table(conn = conn,
              schema = "public",
              table = "test_table",
              names_to_columns = "attribute",
              names_to = "field",
              values_to_column = "attribute_type")

#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: N/A
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Listing Fields...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Listing Fields...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: SELECT person,attribute_value, 'attribute' AS field, attribute AS attribute_type FROM public.test_table
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Returned data has more than 0 rows
#>   person attribute_value     field attribute_type
#> 1  Meera            Tall attribute         Height
#> 2   Syed            Tall attribute         Height
#> 3   Syed           Funny attribute      Character
#> 4  Meera            <NA> attribute      Character


depivot_table(conn = conn,
              schema = "public",
              table = "test_table",
              names_to_columns = c("person", "attribute", "attribute_value"),
              names_to = "field",
              values_to_column = "attribute_type")

#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: N/A
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Listing Fields...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Listing Fields...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: SELECT 'person' AS field, person AS attribute_type FROM public.test_table
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Returned data has more than 0 rows
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: SELECT 'attribute' AS field, attribute AS attribute_type FROM public.test_table
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Returned data has more than 0 rows
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: SELECT 'attribute_value' AS field, attribute_value AS attribute_type FROM public.test_table
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Querying...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Returned data has more than 0 rows
#>              field attribute_type
#> 1           person          Meera
#> 2           person           Syed
#> 3           person           Syed
#> 4           person          Meera
#> 5        attribute         Height
#> 6        attribute         Height
#> 7        attribute      Character
#> 8        attribute      Character
#> 9  attribute_value           Tall
#> 10 attribute_value           Tall
#> 11 attribute_value          Funny
#> 12 attribute_value           <NA>

pg13::drop_table(conn = conn,
                 schema = "public",
                 table = "test_table")

#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Dropping public.test_table...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50] 	
#> ✓ JDBC connection
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	SQL: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public.test_table;
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Sending...
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Sending...complete
#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Dropping public.test_table...complete


pg13::dc(conn = conn)

#> [2020-12-30 19:36:50]	Postgres connection to 'athena' closed
